summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness in an amount not to exceed Twenty one and 92/100 ($21.92) dollars, against the General Fund of the City of Seattle, on account of the cost and expense of the Improvement of Thirty-second Avenue South et al, by the construction of sewers and side sewer connection, as provided by Ordinance No. 20399, creating Local Improvement District No. 1994.
